Making textview text is scrollable is very easy with the use of android:scrollbars=”vertical” attribute inside textview text widget this attribute will enable scrollbar display as vertically format and now we have to add setMovementMethod(new ScrollingMovementMethod()); on textview through MainActivity.java programming file. This method will enable scrolling on TextView. So here is the complete step by step tutorial for Make textview scrollable in android programmatically.Making textview text is scrollable is very easy with the use of android:scrollbars=”vertical” attribute inside textview text widget this attribute will enable scrollbar display as vertically format and now we have to add setMovementMethod(new ScrollingMovementMethod()); on textview through MainActivity.java programming file.
